channel.title: Health on Michael Khoo
channel.description: Recent content in Health on Michael Khoo

item.title: My Achilles Rupture Retrospective - Costs and Timeline
item.description: Introduction Back in early April 2017, I completely ruptured my left achilles tendon playing ultimate frisbee. This was the first of many in my recreational sports career: my first major injury, my first surgery, and my first time in a cast, and my first time on crutches. I went down with a sudden sharp pain and knew instantly that it was bad. It was pretty surreal reaching down to grab your ankle and feeling nothing where your achilles should be.
